about_the_game:
In the demo version of Car Mechanic Shop Simulator you can taste what awaits you in the full version of the game, demo version offers many interesting mechanics and features. Among the available options are the possibility of purchasing additional licenses for products, which will allow you to expand the offer of the workshop, and the sale of motorcycles, introducing a new segment of your business.

Additionally, you will be able to use the mechanics of ordering a cleaning service, which will make it easier to keep the workshop tidy by removing unnecessary boxes. What's more, the demo allows you to save and load the game, which allows you to conveniently continue the game at any time.

Start playing the demo version today! This is a great opportunity to test the key mechanics of the game and feel like a real owner of a car shop. Check out what we have prepared in the demo version now and start your adventure in the world of mechanics today.

Build Your Car Shop Empire

Start your journey with a small shop and strategically develop it into a leading destination for car parts and accessories. Handle everyday items like oil filters, tires, and brake pads, as well as high-performance components such as V8 OHV engine parts, advanced suspension systems, and sophisticated electronics. Your decisions not only shape the operational aspect of your business but also impact its financial health and market reputation.

Master Inventory Management

Enhance your inventory management skills by handling a wide range of car parts, including alternators, clutch kits, radiators, exhaust systems, and advanced electronic systems essential for modern vehicles. Learn to master the art of inventory control, optimize pricing strategies, and respond to market demand. Watch as your auto shop becomes a local industry leader known for efficiency and reliability.

Customize and Expand Your Shop

Personalize your space using various design options - choose layouts, themes, and decorations that reflect your style to attract more customers. As your business grows, you'll be tasked with expanding the physical space of your shop to accommodate increasing inventory and broaden the range of services offered, from routine maintenance to specialized repairs and custom modifications.

Unlock New Car Parts and Technologies

To stay competitive in the rapidly evolving automotive industry, you must continuously unlock new car parts and technologies. Obtain licenses to sell and install advanced parts that meet the diverse needs of car enthusiasts and professional repair shops. This feature ensures that your shop remains at the forefront of innovation, offering the latest advancements in automotive technology, from hybrid engine components to autonomous vehicle systems.

Ensure Customer Satisfaction

Listen carefully to customer feedback and adjust your business strategies to meet their expectations. Excellent customer service is key to building a solid customer base that relies on your shop for all their automotive needs, from simple oil changes to complex engine rebuilds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc 380, Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installation on an SSD drive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc 580, GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installation on an SSD drive
